name: Guaranteed Drops
description: Modifies the nodrop chance for treasure categories to simulate a specific /players setup.
author: olegbl

config.name: /players
config.description: Sets the drop rate to simulate the /players command. 0 = /players infinite (nodrop = 0). 1 = /players 1. 8 = /players 8. etc...

config.name: Fix Countess
config.description: Make countess prefer to drop runes instead of items. Without this fix, the countess will never drop a full 3 runes with NoDrop set to 0.

config.name: Sunder Charms
config.description: The /players value to use for Sunder Charms. If you set 0 here, you'll get a Sunder Charm from every monster, so don't do that.
